modName: Skyrim Silly Creatures Series 1- The Chopperfish
summary: A simple Retexture of the infamous Slaughterfish to resemble the \"Chopper\" enemy from Sonic 1. Very shiny!
descriptionHtml:
While working on the Retro Project, I decided to take a break from remodeling Markath and decided to take a stab at a creature. I highly recommend using it with the Retro Project (can the plug get anymore shameless?).

To install, simply put the \"textures\" folder in your data folder.
author: Astal
